meanings.sent1: He reinspects his work to make sure it is perfect.
meanings.sent2: The teacher reinspects the students' homework for any mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The detective reinspects the crime scene, hoping to find new clues.
meanings.sent4: She reinspects her decision, wondering if she made the right choice.
meanings.sent5: The chef reinspects the dish before sending it out to the customers.

meanings.definition: To examine or review for a second time
meanings.sent1: After finishing the book, she reinspects the plot to understand it better.
meanings.sent2: The manager reinspects the budget to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The scientist reinspects the data, looking for any anomalies.
meanings.sent4: He reinspects his notes before the exam to refresh his memory.
meanings.sent5: The auditor reinspects the financial records for any discrepancies.
